version_description:
* New device sign in option (login without email or Facebook)
* Various GUI fixes and improvements
* Localised pricing (see items in your local currency)

Server and interface improvements
Better support for low-end devices
New translations: Finnish, Indonesian, Turkish

New 3D car paint scheme editor
New translations: Polish (Polski), Hungarian (Magyar), Greek (Ελληνικά) and Romanian (Limba Română)
Improved interface on tablets: automatically highlights selected car and the timing panel can be resized
Improved camera animations
Auto-kick: Inactive players are now automatically removed from leagues to increase activity
Improvements to service network and application stability

New 8K high-definition race-circuit images
Improved Engines, Fuel and Tyres with a wider variety of influences on car design and team finances
Improved stability and speed of interfaces and servers
New video adverts platform
More camera zoom in live races
Cars now appear under overhead objects on race-circuit maps
Fixed chat not working after a race has finished
Improvements for iPhone X

Improvements on 'iPhone X'.
Faster In-App Purchases.
Fixed: A rare scenario in which purchasing 'Tokens' could be prevented by a previously purchased 'Investment Pack'.

• New 2018 car - with 5 new liveries and a graphical overhaul on all platforms offering stunning new visuals.
• Improved tyre performance and balance – all tyre compounds have been modified for better balance and to enable more strategies.
• Performance levels and wear rates have been adjusted, and wear is now scaled to race duration.
• New app notifications – you can choose to be reminded of the practice lock deadline, race start, expiring driver/staff/sponsor contracts and HQ construction projects.
• New deep-linking system – all links to igpmanager.com/app will now open in-app on mobile phones and tablets, enabling easy sharing of profiles, leagues, driver auctions and more.
• New tutorials - with user-friendly step-by-step instructions and far more depth, it’s easier than ever get started and introduce your friends to iGP Manager.
• In-app web browser – continue your account session on the forum with no need to login again, even launching external websites inside iGP Manager, before returning to the app effortlessly.
• Faster loading times - across the entire app loading times have been greatly reduced, by utilising intelligent background loading and caching, so you shouldn’t miss a thing while waiting for anything to load.
• New rewarded video ads partner - our new ads partner offers increased availability of ads and stability of playback in all regions, when watching videos to earn free parts.

• Improved performance and error handling on loading screens
• Fixed IAP failures during network issues

• Fixed livery showing numbers in place of sponsors when a team has no sponsors
• Various other fixes and improvements
